definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: What are the photochemical consequences of long-lived states?
sentences.chinese: 长时间存在的能量状态会造成什么光化学影响？

sentences.english: Photochemical smog is found in many large cities all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 光化学烟雾在世界各地的许多大城市里都有。

sentences.english: The photochemistry of compounds containing both nitro and carbonyl groups and their derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 研究含硝基及羰基之分子及其衍生物之光化学。

sentences.english: HO·may be an important factor to cause photochemical decolorization of congo red.
sentences.chinese: 是导致刚果红发生光化学脱色的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: The relationship between the structure and the photochemical properties was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并对其结构与光化学性能之间的关系进行了讨论。

sentences.english: Expression of gelatinase A and vascular endothelial growth factor in pterygia;
sentences.chinese: 目的观测光化学疗法对内皮细胞明胶酶表达的影响。

sentences.english: To study and evaluate the effects of optical radiation on biological and photochemical systems (exclusive of vision).
sentences.chinese: 研究及评估相关的光辐射的生物及光化学系统的效应。

sentences.english: To function as a laser; emit coherent radiation by the action of a laser.
sentences.chinese: 通过光化学作用测量射线强度的装置。

sentences.english: Apoptosis is the pathological essence of retinal photochemical injury.
sentences.chinese: 视网膜光化学损伤的实质是感光细胞凋亡。
